summary: WHEN BRAKES WERE APPLIED ON CONSUMER'S 1999 CHEVROLET SILVERADO THE BRAKE PEDAL SEEMED TO TRAVEL FARTHER THAN USUAL THEN THE  VEHICLE WOULD NOT STOP. THE ANTILOCK BRAKE LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND REMAINED ON OCCASION. *KB ***NAR***  THE CONSUMER IS AWARE OF SEVERAL RECALLS AND SERVICE BULLETINS RELATED TO ABS BRAKES.  *NM
